title: How to change the volume of your computer - Quora

response.answer_text: You can change the volume in software. The OS will have a system volume control, Windows has the speaker icon in the task bar by the clock. If you’re running a headless Linux distro, you can use a cli volume controller like alsamixer. Any media player program/app will likely have a volume slider or control in its interface somewhere. Depending on your audio setup you might have a physical volume knob or other controller for your speakers.

try to adjust volume by pressing the keyboard shortcuts if you have it or else you can simply try pressing windows button and then type volume so that you will be navigate to settings page where this settings of volume will be available so that you can increase or decrease the volume.
